message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a top-of-the-line item that's been highly praised by our satisfied customers. I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take it off my hands for $100?
I'll take it, thank you!

You're really going to love this one! I've had a lot of great feedback about this product, and I think it's one of our best. It's a great value at $100, but I'm willing to make a deal. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a free accessory that normally costs $20. What do you say?
I'll take it, and I'll also take the free accessory, thank you!

I'll take it, thank you for the discount!
